item.description: This is a Wings program with the FAA Safety Team. Bring your questions! Also, the drawing date for the Airventure Big Weekend Raffle. Better hurry to buy your tickets! Don't miss Airventure in Oshkosh this year!
item.how_to_find_us: Jim Bisson is the real organizer of this meeting.
item.why: Dinner, slide show and chat from 6:00 - 7:00. Meeting starts at 7:00. Always a good time.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association April Meeting
